title: Burma: people of the river
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Asia - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Asia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Asia, Southeastern - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Asia, Southeastern - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Burma - Social conditions
description: The varied regions and ways of living in Burma - the rivers that serve as highways; the rice fields in the delta and river valleys; jungle that yields harvests of teakwood and bamboo; the village life; and the city of Rangoon, centre of commerce, transportation and ancient culture.
